channel.title: Aggregated Paid Chapters Feed
channel.description: Aggregated RSS feed for paid chapters across mapped novels.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthlessâ€”capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodderâ€™s script, Sheng Nuan is terrifiedâ€¦

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: â€œNuan Nuan, youâ€™re not allowed to go anywhere except by my sideâ€¦â€

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: â€œNuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?â€

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: â€œNuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.â€

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: â€œNuan Nuan, itâ€™s your choiceâ€”kill me, or save me.â€

Sheng Nuan became even more panickedâ€¦

If youâ€™re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.
